_meanings:
{@--3@} Final 
emancipation, deliverance of the soul from
recurring births or transmigration,
the last of the four ends of human
existence; see {#arTa#}; 
{#DarmArTakAmamokzARAM yasyEko'pi na vidyate .#} 
{#ajAgalastanasyeva tasya janma nirarTakaM ..#}; <ls>Bg. 5. 28</ls>,
<ls n="Bg.">18. 30</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 84</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 35.</ls>

{@--7@} Shedding, causing to fall
down or flow; {#bAzpamokza, aSrumokza#}.

{@--10@} Acquittance or discharge of
an obligation (debt &c.).

{@--11@} (In 

<ab>astr.</ab>) The liberation of an eclipsed
planet, the end of an eclipse.

a means of obtaining final
emancipation.

an epithet 
applied to Hiouen Thsang, the 
celebrated Chinese traveller.

an epithet of the town
called {#kAMcI#}.
